detectors.description:
Cap3.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#13-66) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#15)
detectors.markdown:
[Cap3.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#L13-L66) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#L15)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Cap3.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#21-23)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#5)
	- Cap3.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#27-29)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Cap3.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#30-32)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Cap3.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#54-58)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Cap3.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#33-42)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap3.sol#9)
